title: Make use of convenient amenities
text:

Offering hotel guests superior services and a broad range of amenities, Hanh Phuc Hotel Can Tho is committed to ensuring that your stay is as comfortable as possible. While lodging at this wonderful property, guests can enjoy business center, room service, elevator, restaurant, free Wi-Fi in all rooms.Hanh Phuc Hotel is home to 51 bedrooms. All are tastefully furnished and many even provide such comforts as hair dryer, non smoking rooms, telephone, internet access, shower. Set in a prime location of Can Tho, Hanh Phuc Hotel Can Tho puts everything the city has to offer just outside your doorstep. The hotel offers guests a range of services and amenities designed to provide comfort and convenience. Airport transfer, tours, room service, elevator, business center are on the list of things guests can enjoy. Designed for comfort, guestrooms offer internet access â€“ wireless (complimentary), daily newspaper, shower, separate shower and tub, mini bar to ensure a restful night. Enjoy the hotel's recreational facilities, including massage, before retiring to your room for a well-deserved rest. Convenience and comfort makes Hanh Phuc Hotel Can Tho the perfect choice for your stay in Can Tho. Situated in Can Tho, Lan Vy Hotel provides 3-star accommodation, as well as a sauna. It is ideally positioned for those wishing to visit local attractions. The hotel offers wireless internet, luggage storage and a concierge. Meeting rooms, a laundry service and room service are also provided. The rooms at Lan Vy Hotel have air conditioning and offer a ceiling fan, wireless internet access and a refrigerator. Cable/satellite channels and a shower are also provided. Guests staying at the hotel can sit down to a unique dining experience at the in-house restaurant, suitably based for those who want to stay close by at mealtime. For those who enjoy exploring local eateries, there is a wide variety right on the door step. Cai Be Floating Market is just a short car ride from the hotel.
